name: Rojiura Satsuki: Chapter Heroine Sanctuary
summary: based around the Chinese Zodiac and parodying Saint SeiyaWP. It unlocked throughout the day when it was active, presenting each chapter in a stone circle illuminating each zodiac symbol with flames. Some chapters have certain gimmicks, such as PokemonWP-style battles that can lead to a game over.

videos.name: Game Intro
videos.title: Type-Moon April Fool's 2013: Saint Satsuki - Part 1
